Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse SectionStyleProperties

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementBlockStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.SectionStyleProperties
public class SectionStyleProperties extends ElementBlockStyleProperties
Concrete style properties for a section element. A section can be used to group content and apply specific background, padding, or borders to it.

    • copy

      public SectionStyleProperties copy()
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: ElementBlockStyleProperties
      Creates a deep copy of this style properties object. This is crucial to prevent style modifications on one element from affecting another.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      copy in Klasse ElementBlockStyleProperties
      Gibt zurück:
      A new instance with the same property values as this object.
